name: Instagram Lead Magnet Automation
description:
This Make template automates your Instagram lead generation workflow. When a user leaves a comment on your post, the scenario is triggered and automatically sends them a personalized direct message and saves the data from the interaction in a Google sheet. The DM thanks them for their engagement and asks for their email address in order to deliver a freebie (e.g., a guide, checklist, or special offer). 

With the submission of the email the collected data is added to KlickTipp via this scenario template:
www.make.com/en/integration/17237-jotform-instagram-smart-lead-enrichment-for-subscription-in-klicktipp?templatePublicId=17237

By providing their email, users consent to receive further communication such as tips, offers, or relevant updates. This process ensures seamless audience growth while respecting GDPR-friendly practices.

Use this template to:

Convert engaged Instagram users into email subscribers.

Deliver valuable freebies directly after a comment.

Automate the first step of your email marketing funnel.

Save time and ensure consistent follow-ups.

Ideal for creators, coaches, and businesses that want to grow their email list directly from Instagram engagement without manual work.
